TextBranch.Text:
#cy#ETYB:#ec# Hi there.

This is a bit embarrassing, but, er, do you know where we are?

Button.Name: We're in Riverstone Camp. How did you get here?

TextBranch.Text:
#cy#ETYB:#ec# Well, you see, I don't quite remember. Although, perhaps that doesn't matter now.

This seems like a nice enough place!

Button.Name: A nice enough place for what?
A nice enough place for what?
